pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Decomposition of Group Disparities // The causal decompositions of group disparities developed by Yu and Elwert (2023) https://ang-yu.github.io/files/Causal_Decomposition_of_G roup_Disparities_2023.pdf. This package implements the estimators for the decomposition components that are based on efficient influence functions. For the nuisance functions of the estimators, both parametric and nonparametric options are provided, as well as manual options in case the default models are not satisfying.
